last_episode_to_air.name: Time Capsule
last_episode_to_air.overview: Our hosts revisit the past and share with us their first love. Or do they? AMG turns fifty years old. One man shares his opinion on what epitomizes the Mercedes tuner from its humble beginnings to the latest supercar.

name: Top Gear America
overview: Reviewing not just exclusive and state-of-the-art vehicles, but also the cars of Americaâ€™s culture-defining past.

episodes.name: Made in America
episodes.overview: Hosts William Fichtner, Tom "Wookie" Ford and Antron Brown set out on a true bonding adventure in VW Bugs in Baja Mexico. The latest NSX is pushed to its limits by the Stig, and the Ford Raptor rips through the desert.

episodes.name: Movie Magic
episodes.overview: This week, the boys teach everyone a few tricks of the movie trade. Bill gets to find out what it was like to be Steve McQueen driving the iconic Mustang that starred in the greatest car chase of all time in the 1968 film, 'Bullitt'.

episodes.name: Life On The Go
episodes.overview: The great wide open is the American landscape. Pick your car, set out down the highway and find a path less traveled. Bill, Wookie and Antron choose campers for this adventure, but will they make it home? Then, the Stig takes a minivan around the track.

episodes.name: Drive Your Life
episodes.overview: Antron takes us into the pits of NHRA and teaches Wookie to drive. The latest police fleet gets tested at the driving academy, and Bill tests the Cadillac CTS-V at speed. Haley Joel Osment stops by the track.

episodes.name: Humble Beginnings
episodes.overview: The boys hit a dirt oval track near the birthplace of NASCAR. Their classics spray mud across all lanes as they race to the finish. Meanwhile, The Stig tests childhood dreams with the Skyline and sets the track on fire in the Audi R8.

episodes.name: Outside The Box
episodes.overview: Ride side-by-side with Antron, Bill and Wookie as they explore the latest craze in recreation vehicles, the UTV. They test their bravery against the steepest hillsides SoCal has to offer.

episodes.name: The Best
episodes.overview: What sports car would you buy if you had $7,000? Bill's car was written in song, Antron unleashes the ponies and Wookie picks the less obvious example of the bunch. The Stig settles the score around the track with a proper head-to-head.

episodes.name: Time Capsule
episodes.overview: Our hosts revisit the past and share with us their first love. Or do they? AMG turns fifty years old. One man shares his opinion on what epitomizes the Mercedes tuner from its humble beginnings to the latest supercar.
